actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide estate tax credit for the transfer of property for inclusion in the Golden Gate National Recreation Area, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to allow an estate tax credit to the estate of a named individual for conveyance to the United States of certain real property in San Mateo County, California, for inclusion in the Golden Gate National Recreation Area, California.

titles.title: A bill to provide estate tax credit for the transfer of property for inclusion in the Golden Gate National Recreation Area, California.
